name: Coward's Cloak
effect: Allows the holding Temtem to gain experience and TV from Combat without taking part.

name: Decoy
effect: Increases the chance of running away from Combat.

name: Fire Chip
effect: Damage dealt from Fire techniques is increased by 10%.

name: Four-leaf Clover
effect: Increases the catch-rate when capturing untamed Temtem.

name: Hand Fan
effect: Damage dealt from Wind techniques is increased by 10%.

name: Lightning Rod
effect: Damage taken from Electric techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Lure
effect: Untamed Temtem are forced to target the bearer.

name: Pillow
effect: Restores 10% max HP of an Asleep Temtem at turn start.

name: Proteins
effect: Doubles the TV gain from defeating untamed Temtem.

name: Pansunscreen
effect: Prevents the Burnt Status condition.

name: Talisman
effect: Prevents the Doomed Status condition.

name: Umbrella
effect: Damage taken from Water techniques is reduced by 20%.
location: Reward from Tourist Guide in Arissola

name: Ice Cube
effect: Damage taken from Fire techniques is reduced by 20%.
location: Left side of the first platform segment of the Mokupuni Dojo

name: Energy Drink
effect: Prevents the Asleep status condition.
location: Reward from Find Kemal in Quetzal

name: Rock Shield
effect: Damage taken from Crystal techniques is reduced by 20%.
location: Reward from Find Kemal in Quetzal

name: Squeezer
effect: HP recovered from medicine items used in battle is increased by 70%.
location: Reward from Find Kemal in Quetzal

name: Sweatband
effect: Restores 15% of max STA at the start of each turn.
location: Reward from Cultist Hunt in Quetzal

name: Tucma Mask
effect: Damage taken from Toxic techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Snare
effect: When attacked, disables the attacker's gear.

name: Chamomile
effect: When entering the battlefield, removes stage changes.
location: Found at Wreck of the Narwhal

name: Grease
effect: Prevents the Trapped status condition.
location: Found at Wreck of the Narwhal

name: Shuine's Horn
effect: Changes the Temtem's Toxic-type techniques to Water.

name: Vitality DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's HP.

name: Lithe DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPEED.

name: Aggressive DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's ATK.

name: Gifted DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPATK.

name: Endurance DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's STA.

name: Hardening DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's DEF.

name: Dominant DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPDEF.

name: Vigor DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's HP and STA.

name: Mighty DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's ATK and SPATK.

name: Immunity DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's DEF and SPDEF.

name: Engineered DNA Strand
effect: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's Trait slot.
